# sources

**Instance Property**

An array of geometry sources that provide vertex data for the geometry.

## Declaration

```swift
var sources: [SCNGeometrySource] { get }
```

## Discussion

Each [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNGeometrySource] object describes an attribute of all vertices in the geometry (such as vertex position, surface normal vector, color, or texture mapping coordinates) identified by the source’s [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNGeometrySource/semantic-swift.property] property. A geometry always has at least one source (for the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNGeometrySource/Semantic-swift.struct/vertex] semantic), typically has additional sources for use in lighting and shading, and may have other sources for skeletal animation or surface subdivision information.

## Managing Geometry Data

- **elements**: An array of geometry elements that describe the geometry’s shape.
- **elementCount**: The number of geometry elements in the geometry.
- **element(at:)**: Returns the geometry element at a specified index.
- **sources(for:)**: Returns the geometry sources for a specified semantic.
